Uses of HasDojo in com.objetdirect.tatami.client
 

Classes in com.objetdirect.tatami.client that implement HasDojo
 class AbstractDojo
          This abstract class aims to d'implement the necessaries method to integrate easily a Dojo widget in a GWT Widget.
 class AbstractDojoComplexPane
          This abstract class aims to simplify the integration of a Dojo widget in GWT ComplexPane.
 class AbstractDojoFocus
          This abstract class aims to d'implement the necessaries method to integrate easily a Dojo widget in a GWT FocusWidget.
 class BasePicker
           Class of widgets that permit to choose a temporal information (date, hour,...) from a Dojo widget represented by a selector.
 class Button
          This class is a simple wrapper around dojo button.
 class ColorChooser
          Class of widgets that permit to choose a color (represented by a string with an hexadecimal format : #RRGGBB) from a selector of colors DOJO widget.
 class ColorPicker
          provides an interactive HSV ColorPicker similar to PhotoShop's color selction tool.
 class DatePicker
          This class permits to choose a date from a calendar of a Dojo Widget
 class DojoContentPane
          Class of DOJO panels that present only the feature that this to gather widgets (Dojo of other).
 class DropdownContainer
          Basic class of the widgets those associate an input and a popup window to display or edit a temporal information.
 class DropdownDatePicker
          A form input for entering dates with a pop-up DatePicker to aid in selection
 class DropdownTimePicker
          A form input for entering dates with a pop-up TimePicker to aid in selection The DropDownTimePicker component aims to simplify the edition of an hour in a input form.
 class FishEye
          Menu similar to the fish eye menu on the Mac OS.
 class NumberSpinner
          This class wraps the dojo NumberSpinner.
 class RuleLabels
           
 class RuleMark
          This class permits to create some mark like a rule.
 class Slider
          Class for widgets with a cursor that permit to choose an integer value bounded by a max value and a min value.
 class TimePicker
          A selector of temporal information : hour and minute.
 class Toaster
          This widget does display in a corner of a container some messages which disappear afetr a delay.
